id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the campaign was created

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the campaign was last updated

startAt.description: The timestamp when the campaign will start

endedAt.description: The timestamp when the campaign ended

templateId.description: The ID of the template used for the campaign

messageMedium.description: The medium used to deliver the campaign message (e.g., email, SMS)

createdByUserId.description: The ID of the user who created the campaign

updatedByUserId.description: The ID of the user who last updated the campaign

campaignState.description: The current state of the campaign (e.g., draft, active, paused)

listIds.description: List of IDs of the lists targeted by the campaign

suppressionListIds.description: List of IDs of suppression lists for the campaign

sendSize.description: The size of the audience targeted by the campaign

recurringCampaignId.description: If the campaign is recurring, the ID of the parent recurring campaign

workflowId.description: The ID of the workflow associated with the campaign

labels.description: List of labels associated with the campaign

type.description: The type of campaign (e.g., one-time, recurring)
